comments: Mapping of special non-ASCII characters to an obsolete standard of mnemonics (RFC 1345 from 1992). E.g., inputting 'Æ' prints '&AE'.
Prints characters in the ICL-1900 punch card format. Not useful for standard display.
Mapping of ASCII characters to their octal ASCII codes.
Mapping of ASCII characters to their hexadecimal ASCII codes.
Mapping of ASCII characters to their binary ASCII codes.
Mapping of ASCII characters to their decimal ASCII codes.
Mapping of ASCII characters to Morse code dots and dashes.
Mapping of ASCII characters to Morse code dots and dashes.
Rotates alphabetical characters by 13 positions.
Mapping of characters to other characters that look like upside down versions of the initial characters.
Mapping of latin characters to their CJK full-width equivalents.
Mapping of characters to circled versions of these characters (e.g., Ⓐ). TOIlet font.
Mapping to fingering charts (tablature) for six hole diatonic flutes like the tin whistle.
Mapping to non-textual chess piece symbols.
Mapping to non-textual illustratios.
Mapping to illustrations representing Egyptian hieroglyphs, too small a subset of hieroglyphs to be considered an international language font.
Identical to 'Nancyj' with the only difference that 'Nancyj-Improved' uses Windows line endings end 'Nancyj' uses Unix line endings.
Exact duplicate of 'Larry 3D'.
Superseded by 'Crawford2' (to be renamed to Crawford Patorjk), which is a much improved version (the current version is really ugly).
Older version of 'Banner' by the same author.
Older version of 'Runyc' which adds support for substantially more characters such as lower-case runes.
Similar to 'Fire Font-k' but uses different smushing options in the header, which can also be set dynamically. Skip this font ane instead rename 'Fire Font-k' to 'Fire Font'.
Less complete version of 'Fun Faces'.
Leetspeak font from the  World of Warcraft (WoW) era (around 2005), unreadable.
Leetspeak font, unreadable.
Leetspeak font, unreadable.
Leetspeak font, unreadable.
Vertical (90 degrees rotated), leetspeak-like font, unreadable.
Leetspeak font, unreadable.
90-degree rotated 2-line font, unreadable.
